title.en: Aspiration for All Lives to Come1

text.en: In the course of all my births and lives to come,
May unwholesome thoughts never cross my mind,
text.en-trans: dik sem yi la mi kyé zhing

text.en: May I exert myself fully in the sacred Dharma
text.en-trans: dampé chö la rab tsön té

text.en: And impartially accomplish the twofold aim!
